text: The is a member of the Cabinet of Japan. The minister is nominated by the Prime Minister of Japan. The current minister is Yoji Muto, who took office on 1 October 2024. ==List of ministers of economy, trade and industry (2001–)== Minister Minister Minister Minister Term of office Term of office Term of office Prime Minister Prime Minister # Portrait Portrait Name Took office Left office Days Prime Minister Prime Minister 1 Takeo Hiranuma January 6, 2001 September 22, 2003 Yoshiro Mori 1 Takeo Hiranuma January 6, 2001 September 22, 2003 Junichiro Koizumi 2 Shoichi Nakagawa September 22, 2003 October 31, 2005 Junichiro Koizumi 3 Toshihiro Nikai (1st) October 31, 2005 September 26, 2006 Junichiro Koizumi 4 Akira Amari September 26, 2006 August 2, 2008 Shinzō Abe 4 Akira Amari September 26, 2006 August 2, 2008 Yasuo Fukuda (3) Toshihiro Nikai (2nd) August 2, 2008 September 16, 2009 Yasuo Fukuda (3) Toshihiro Nikai (2nd) August 2, 2008 September 16, 2009 Tarō Asō 5 Masayuki Naoshima September 16, 2009 September 17, 2010 Yukio Hatoyama 5 Masayuki Naoshima September 16, 2009 September 17, 2010 Naoto Kan 6 Akihiro Ohata September 17, 2010 January 14, 2011 Naoto Kan 7 Banri Kaieda January 14, 2011 September 2, 2011 Naoto Kan 8 Yoshio Hachiro September 2, 2011 September 11, 2011 Yoshihiko Noda 9 Yukio Edano September 12, 2011 December 26, 2012 Yoshihiko Noda 10 Toshimitsu Motegi December 26, 2012 September 3, 2014 Shinzō Abe 11 Yūko Obuchi September 3, 2014 October 21, 2014 Shinzō Abe 12 Yoichi Miyazawa October 21, 2014 October 7, 2015 Shinzō Abe 13 Motoo Hayashi October 7, 2015 August 3, 2016 Shinzō Abe 14 Hiroshige Sekō August 3, 2016 September 11, 2019 Shinzō Abe 15 Isshu Sugawara September 11, 2019 October 25, 2019 Shinzō Abe 16 Hiroshi Kajiyama October 25, 2019 October 4, 2021 Yoshihide Suga 17 Kōichi Hagiuda October 4, 2021 August 10, 2022 Fumio Kishida 18 Yasutoshi Nishimura August 10, 2022 December 14, 2023 Fumio Kishida 19 Ken Saitō December 14, 2023 October 1, 2024 Fumio Kishida 20 Yoji Muto October 1, 2024 Incumbent Shigeru Ishiba == References == *
